lead_paragraph: In their walk-up in the West Village, Kerry Trueman and Matt Rosenberg show how building an apartment garden has become easier.

headline.main: Urban Gardening on the Third Floor

snippet: In their walk-up in the West Village, Kerry Trueman and Matt Rosenberg show how building an apartment garden has become easier.
abstract: Kerry Trueman and Matt Rosenberg have mastered art of urban gardening, growing everything from tomatoes to soybeans in window boxes of their West Village walk-up.
